page.text: DEANNA FISHER
Raleigh, North Carolina 27606 l C: 407-782-4596 l
The Green Chair Project
Intern, June 2014 to present- Raleigh, North Carolina
Assisted in the overall growth and influence of their
social media reach within the local market and
developed a web-based newsletter. Coordinated the
branding and marketing efforts of the annual fundraiser
coupled with the implementation of an overall pricing
and inventory system for the retail department.
Supported day-to-day business operations of the non-
profit organization and implemented budget saving
practices in multiple departments. Coordinated daily
volunteer efforts and multiple corporate sponsors
groups.
WRAL.com
Intern/Shadow, June 2014 to present- Raleigh, North Carolina
Assisted in overall set up, break down and production of
local events such as the Raleigh Beer Guide launch,
various “Go Ask Mom” events, Midtown Beach Music
Series and Fan Town Hall with 99.9FM The Fan radio.
Contributed to the overall increase of social media
followers and interaction during and following various
events.
Swamp Restaurant
Food and Beverage Coordinator, April 2012 to May 2014-
Gainesville, Florida
Demonstrated superior ability in customer service and
suggestive selling skills in a high volume and high
stress environment. Also exhibited high value multi-
tasking abilities when placed in leadership roles.
Saving Young Hearts & Parent Heart Watch
Volunteer, May 2006 to present- Orlando, Florida
Assisted in the creation of advertising brochures as well
as brainstorming sessions to develop new campaign
ideas and execution. Also assisted with the preparation
of educational booths and fundraising events
throughout the area.
Canine Companions for Independence
Volunteer, January 2005 to present- Orlando, Florida &
Raleigh, North Carolina
Assisted in the set up, marketing and production of the
annual Tales and Tails fundraising gala. Also participated in
puppy intake and adult matriculation procedure as well as
ceremony in addition to the puppy-raising program.
University of Florida
Graduated May 2014- Gainesville, Florida
Bachelor of Science in Advertising with a concentration
in human psychology
Active member of AdSociety
Santa Fe College
Graduated May 2011- Gainesville, Florida
Associate of Arts in Business Sciences
Associate of Science in Zoo Animal Technology
Winter Park High School
Graduated May 2008- Winter Park, Florida
Editor of school yearbook publication
Adobe Photoshop CS6
Adobe InDesign CS6
Illustrator
Aloha operating system
Mac operating system
Windows operating system
